tasks.title: Cursor behaviour
tasks.description:
Implement all normal cursor behaviour:
 - Going back and forward through the command line.
 - Going up and down lines.
 - At end/beginning of lines, go to the end/beginning of line.

tasks.title: Settings page
tasks.description: A settings page with the ability to change the colour schemes, the layout between vertical and horizontal split. Remember to put an example at the bottom of it.

tasks.title: Coordinate style
tasks.description: Before the settings page, it would be good to get a consistent looking style for the whole application.

tasks.title: Saving of settings to json
tasks.description: The app should be able to save the settings to a json file.

tasks.title: Implement deletion of tasks
tasks.description: Implement the ability to delete tasks upon pressing the 'd' key.

tasks.title: Reopen tasks
tasks.description: Add the ability to open tasks again from the archived tasks page. They should be removed from the archive.

tasks.title: Navigate archived tasks
tasks.description: With cursor keys and 'h'/'l' you should be able to navigate the archives of tasks.

tasks.title: Archived tasks
tasks.description: Display a page with the archived tasks, with a title indicating the date upon which it was archived.

tasks.title: Implement closure of tasks
tasks.description: Upon pressing the 'c' key, the tasks marked as done shall disappear from the list. They should be added to the archived tasks page.

tasks.title: Pop up for adding/editing a task
tasks.description: At the moment tasks are added by directly editing the description and title in the display box. However it would be better to introduce a pop up for editing and adding.

tasks.title: Reordering tasks in the active tasks page
Refactor rendering functions
tasks.description: The render functions contain the same basic code repeated because it was simpler, it can be massively simplified. In doing so, the pop up should be easier to implement.

tasks.title: Beautify interface
tasks.description: Pop up could use some work.
